refnamediv.refpurpose: Remove an array from the SciDB namespace

refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: The AFL remove operator works like the AQL DROP ARRAY statement. The argument named_array must be an array that was previously created and stored in the SciDB namespace.

informalexample.para: Create an array named source and then remove it:store(build(<val:double>[i=0:9,10,0],1),source); remove(source);
